column5: Telerin]] origin who set out on the [[Great Journey]] from [[Cuiviénen]].  When the [[Teleri]] reached the Great River [[Anduin]] and saw the [[Misty Mountains]] across their path to the west, they fell away from the Journey.  Lenwë led a part of the Teleri south down the [[Vales of Anduin]].  Lenwë's people afterwards became known as the [[Nandor]].
